name: Mercurius praecipitatus ruber
details: Suffocative attacks at night on lying down WHILE ON THE POINT OF FALLING ASLEEP, obliged to jump up suddenly which relieves; gonorrhoea; URETHRA FELT AS A HARD STRING; chancroid; phagedenic ulcer and bubo; pemphigus, mucous patches, eczema with rhagades and fissures, barber's itch; blepharitis, internally and externally; leaden heaviness in occiput, with otorrhoea.
